text: ' is a Hiroden temporary station on the Hiroden Miyajima Line, located in Hatsukaichi, Hiroshima. It is used only during the speedboat race at Miyajima Speedboat Racing Stadium. ==Routes== From the station, there is one Hiroden Streetcar route. *28px Hiroshima Station - Hiroden-miyajima-guchi Route ==Connections== ;█ Miyajima Line :28px ::Hiroden-ajina — Kyōteijō-mae (temporary stop) — Hiroden-miyajima-guchi ==Around station== *Miyajima Speedboat Racing Stadium ==History== *Opened as Kyōteijō-mae in 1954. *Renamed to Miyajima Boat Race Jō on April 1, 2019. ==References== ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes Category:Hiroden Miyajima Line stations Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1954
title: Miyajima Boat Race Jō Station
